actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture

official_title: To amend the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to eliminate current Federal subsidies for alcoholic beverage promotions overseas.
short_title: End Taxpayer Promotion of Alcohol Overseas Act

summary.text: End Taxpayer Promotion of Alcohol Overseas Act - Amends the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to prohibit use of market access program funds to promote the sale or export of alcoholic beverages.

titles.title: End Taxpayer Promotion of Alcohol Overseas Act
To amend the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to eliminate current Federal subsidies for alcoholic beverage promotions overseas.
